website_summaries.verdict: The intuitive design paired with the convenient clean and dirty magnet labels make this dishwasher basket easy to use for everyone.
pros: Can be used as 1 large basket, or separated into 2 smaller ones
There are large and small dividers for silverware and utensils
The decorative flip-down lid helps to keep silverware separate, ensuring it gets clean
Basket comes with "clean" and "dirty" magnet labels for further organization
cons: Handle is short, making it awkward to lift the basket out

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This easily separates into two pieces, so if the two baskets connected as one don't fit, not a problem. I have a whirlpool dishwasher and often the stock silverware basket would fill up before the trays would fill up with dishes and glasses. This solved that problem and we no longer have to run the dishwasher early just because of the silverware being full. I easily removed the handle as I didn't feel it was necessary, but it's there if you prefer. The material is pretty solid and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like the two compartments. We use the smaller one every load and the larger one when needed. It fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than What it Came With
customer_reviews.text: This is a much nicer dishwasher basket than the one that came with our dishwasher. Hopefully it doesn't wear out as fast, but it is a better plastic so it probably won't. I really like the closing lids for when I need to do the lids from those little salad dressing containers or my reusable canning lids and seals. I don't have to worry about them getting lost in the dishwasher. It seems to fan the silverware out a little more, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This rack feels sturdy and well built, and since it comes in two parts it’s easy to fit in different dishwashers. The clean and dirty magnet is super convenient with multiple people in the household who do dishes.
customer_reviews.author: N. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: The basket fits my GE dishwasher perfectly. Very pleased with my purchase. The clean/dirty magnet sign was a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Joyous

customer_reviews.title: Works well, just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I like that it can come apart to use separately. I just wish the grated bottom of these were a little bigger. I had to push the utensil baskets down and pop my dishwasher spokes through to fit on the rack but thatonly took a couple minutes to figure out. And the handle doesn’t serve a purpose for me at all, but it’s only taking up one extra space. Looks good and works for what I needed though!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine A Hill

customer_reviews.title: Easily separtes into 2 silverware compartments
customer_reviews.text: You don't have to worry weather or not this will fit correctly in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Carne

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Replacement
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new dishwasher with a huge silverware basket. It took up too much room. We ordered this as a replacement that wouldn't take up as much room. The fact that it separates made it perfect. We put the small basket along the front and the bigger basket along one side. Both cover about half of the side, giving us effectively one extra row to put dishes in.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Todd Evans

customer_reviews.title: Fits between rows
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It is well made and arrived promptly. I was delighted to see that if fits between the rows of my dishwasher if you click the two pieces apart. I haven't seen any basket with that feature. You can use the small side or the large side and used separately they each fit in the rows.
customer_reviews.author: John Q Public

customer_reviews.title: Needs a little bit of forcing, but will fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Bosch diskwasher. With a little pressure, I was able to push it down over the tines of the lower dishrack. Lots of space, plenty of room for a host of silverware and other things. This was a very good upgrade, compared to the OEM rack which gets cluttered up easily (less clearance between silverware = less cleaning).
customer_reviews.author: Philip Verdieck

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new basket for my dishwasher because my silverware would always fall through the holes of my old one due to the flatware being super thin. That would make me crazy!! Anyway, this one works great with no issues and I am able to separate the two parts and put one on each side of the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Gilbraith

customer_reviews.title: FIts Perfectly and Magnet is great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in our Whirlpool dishwasher, best as it's folded in half (shorter, fatter rectangle). Serves the purpose of being a second silverware holder. The magnet was a fantastic bonus! We actually were looking for a clean/dirty magnet for it, and this bonus was great! And it's a strong magnet! It doesn't slide around when the door is opened and closed.
customer_reviews.author: 3D

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher basket!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find a basket that works great and doesn't cost $$$$$. We have a Kenmore Elite dishwasher and the replacement basket was $37!!! This one is better and is only $19. I left it doubled up for now with the baskets connected, but if I needed more plate space I can disconnect and use the 2 baskets side by side. Love that it also has a sliding top to cover loose objects if needed and it slides out of the way if not. It also came with a "dirty/clean" magnet (for free).
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has two parts. I park them in the corner of the lower rack. The design holds the flatware apart perfect and the open small portion fits the forks perfect. I am very happy to have bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Our silverware basket in our dishwasher always seemed to be overcrowded and didn't clean the silverware all the time. I purchased this extra basket (it's great that you can use it as a larger basket or separate it and use it as two smaller baskets). Now I can separate my silverware into more baskets and get it clean. Great product at a really good price. Also love the clean/dirty magnet that came with it. I've had clean dishes in dishwasher and no one in family knew it and would put dirty dishes in it. Now they can read the magnet and know if they are clean or dirty.
customer_reviews.author: cruisers5

customer_reviews.title: Two in One
customer_reviews.text: Great for using separate or together. I have a 10 service dishwasher, small one. Great if I want to add more silverware instead of anything else. Beautiful material and nice packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Mvmaury

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was so easy and product exactly as stated!
customer_reviews.text: The silverware basket supplied with my new Bosch dishwasher was too shallow. I ordered this one and it is just enough deeper to better accommodate my silverware without pieces falling over. The free dirty/clean magnet included with my order was a nice freebee and very much appreciated-thanks!
customer_reviews.author: D. Logan

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very good, color same as the trays
customer_reviews.text: Bought this basket to replace the one in my samsung dmt400 dishwasher. Quality is very good, color same as the trays, fits fine into the bottom tray with some plate holder spikes poking thru the holes in the bottom. Can also detach the smaller section and that can be placed in the bottom tray too. it comes in a delightful box, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MarkA

customer_reviews.title: Flexible is the answer
customer_reviews.text: Fit in my dishwasher not because I have the right model but because its a good design. Nice when things work!
customer_reviews.author: keith simpson

customer_reviews.title: It does what it is intended to do.
customer_reviews.text: My new dishwasher needed a basket with holes for silverware. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: David Fincher

customer_reviews.title: Fits in Bosch Model she43f06uc
customer_reviews.text: The previous owners of the house took the silverware basket when they moved. Classy. This one fits perfectly and was a much better deal than the manufacturer's part. I like that you can close the lid on some of the compartments so smaller items don't fly out. I have found that some pairs of chopsticks still slide through the holes at times, but not consistently.
customer_reviews.author: C. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and usefulness!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the versatility of this silverware basket. It fit perfectly in my dishwasher, and it's nice to have the option to enclose loose items to keep them from flying out of the basket. I also like the smaller divisions on one side of the basket, it helps to keep the utensils separated. The only thing I don't like is the handle isn't in a fixed position, but it is easy to move it from one side to the other. I like the sturdy material they used for the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Game lover

customer_reviews.title: Silverware basket
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, sturdy silverware basket. Fits in bottom rack of my Miele dishwasher nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great with the handle on in our Maytag Quiet Series ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits great with the handle on in our Maytag Quiet Series 300. Looks to be better construction than the one the dishwasher came with, especially the bottom which is what gave out on the original. I also like the magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We have already replaced the original rack with a rack from our parts list. They bottoms of both just fell apart. The ones we just bought from LemonDrop are a much better deal. They seem to be just fine. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Dee

customer_reviews.title: On time and item as promised
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher rack arrived on time and as promised. It fits in my mini Kenmore dishwasher, but I did have to split it in half, which is is build to do. I have had no issue yet, have used it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works with any dishwasher cleaning the spoons
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for any dishwasher. Ours came with our new home and the utensil holder is on the door, doing a very poor job of washing the spoons. We put this out onto the bottom rack and our utensils come out clean every time. I like it being split into two so that it can fit into any dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Gun Sam Kim

customer_reviews.title: Welcome addition to the original silverware basket
customer_reviews.text: The factory silverware basket was always filled to the max, much to my wife's disapproval. We seemed to end-up washing a lot of silverware by hand between loads. This basket was a welcome addition and my wife is very happy with the increased capacity. Fits perfectly into our dishwasher bottom rack. The clean/dirty magnet is a handy addition!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such an easy replacement for our dishwasher basket
customer_reviews.text: Our dishwasher is 10 yrs old, utensil basket got a hole in it. Ordered this one, fits perfect and is sturdier than the one that came with the dishwasher. Even has a lift handle. So much cheaper than I think it would have been if we had to track down the exact replacement for our model from the manufacturer. Thank you amazon!
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this basket for my college grandson’s apartment. The silverware basket was missing from their dishwasher any who do you think would buy that for him but Grammy. He said it fits and works perfectly so he and his roommates are happy. Imagine a college apartment with a dishwasher. Lucky huh!
customer_reviews.author: Judi Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to replace basket that disintegrated in our dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit I don’t think all Bosh dishwashers
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it does not fit my bosh that good. But making it work
customer_reviews.author: Rendy l. Burley

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Lemonhouse! This product is great. It fits my dishawasher perfecrly. The addition of the CLEAN/DIRTY magnet is nice. No more mix-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly...works like a charm..nice to not have knives and forks slipping through to the bottom of the dishwasher again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rack
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement for my old one that was misplaced when we moved. It is just the right size for my dishwasher. It has enough compartments to hold my forks , knives and spoons separately. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Zigora

customer_reviews.title: More than for a dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I got it for when I handwash dishes, it really does all I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: M P

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Since the Samsung replacement would have cost $80 for some ridiculous reason this was a no-brainer to choose. It is doing its rightful job thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fraley

customer_reviews.title: Multi use
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this next to our landline (yes, still) telephone for pens, scissors, notepad, etc. It holds a lot, always seems to have room for one more item. Can carry it around if I want to move it around.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchiesu

customer_reviews.title: Fridgidaire Utincil Cup Holder
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into a home and the dishwasher basket was missing. The replacement fit the Fridgidaire as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: A great replacement for our old dishwasher! Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: L.K.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but I am not able to use it anymore. The only thing is it is not fitting properly in Maytag dishwasher. It should be a wider and shorter in length.
customer_reviews.author: Sudipt Mangal

customer_reviews.title: PROBLEM SOLVED
customer_reviews.text: Solved the problem of silverware being too crowded to be thoroughly cleaned. The material is of good quality and fits my new dishwasher quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia C.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for a great price. I like how it come apart and can be used separately. I have used it for several months now and no warping or melting. I recommend for silverware and other small items in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: lifeisgood

customer_reviews.title: Love this silverware holder, use in an LG machine
customer_reviews.text: This product is so helpful to keep our silverware from not falling into the bottom of the dishwasher. Fact that it splits into two pieces is very helpful. Very sturdy and easy to fit in my dishwasher. Fits well in an LG machine. No more leaks caused by silverware falling into the bottom of the dishwasher. Thank you love it!
customer_reviews.author: klc923

customer_reviews.title: I like that it can easily be separated into 2 baskets ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly with my dishwasher. I like that it can easily be separated into 2 baskets which allow me to adjust where to place it when my dishwasher load is full. Been using it for a few weeks and quality is good. The clean dirty magnet is such a good combo to have. I did not realize I needed one until I started using it. Arrived in a very nice packaging. Very useful set to give as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for poor quality caddy that came with dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. It fits in my dishwasher perfectly. Nice size too.
customer_reviews.author: kellycreekchick

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for my small cutlery
customer_reviews.text: Just what the doctor ordered!!! Fitted my whirlpool perfectly not too big, love the bonus/ magnet that says dirty on one side and clean on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: floden

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwasher basket
customer_reviews.text: My dishwasher basket was totally broken, I bought this and it does the job works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: HappyNeens

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like my previous silverware basket so I bought this one. It's big enough to hold many utensils and it fits perfectly in my dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Lightening

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We always seem to have more flatware than basket space. This basket seems sturdy, and the smaller half slides off, so you can fit it where needed. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M Sewin

customer_reviews.title: Great if you own shaker mixers!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the storage space on this. I like that I can fit my hand mixer part in here and they don’t fly all over the dish washer. Great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my old dishwasher. Makes it look a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This silverware replacement basket worked great for us. Much better than the one that came with our dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gillis

customer_reviews.title: Great product and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and well worth the price. I should have ordered this and just thrown the cheap thing away that came with my dishwasher to being with
customer_reviews.author: N.G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mom. She loves it. Check another one off the list.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg W. Whitmer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy well designed
customer_reviews.text: It is a handy size, exactly what I ordered and the clean/dirty magnet was a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Holds more silverware and comes out clean!!!
customer_reviews.text: SO AWESOME I AM GOING TO BUY 2 MORE!! fits great in our Bosch and finally holds lots of silverware and it gets clean!!! LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: GOLFDIVA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my dish washer. No problems at all. Stay's put and everything gets nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. High quality.
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice surprise to receive the dirty/clean magnet with the order.
customer_reviews.author: A Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked out good
customer_reviews.text: Much heavyer duty than the original, just wish both halves were the same size (wider) Love the included Dirty/Clean magnet
customer_reviews.author: RacerX

customer_reviews.title: A good product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I love how it separates into two sections so that I can move it around depending on how much space I need in the load. I also like that one side has a cover and that it is moveable so I can use it when I need it and it is easy to move when I don’t. It is very spacious and holds a lot of silverware.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It works and can hold a good amount of silverware
customer_reviews.text: I have this product in my dishwasher right now. I just use it to wash my silverware, and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Adams

customer_reviews.title: It comes apart so will fit in any dishwasher. ...
customer_reviews.text: It comes apart so will fit in any dishwasher. We usually use more silverware than dishes and were having to run the dishwasher before it was full. Leaving the smaller part in the dishwasher means we can fill the dishwasher and the silverware gets clean.
customer_reviews.author: Chalice Burbage Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: The product did not fit my Samsung dishwasher as the description said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Manero

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit my Maytag dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: This is not a ‘Universal fitting’ item. I have a Maytag.
customer_reviews.author: monte edwards

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description! Does not fit Samsung dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This did not fit properly in my Samsung dishwasher. It should not say it's universal and list Samsung in their description. Will have to return. What a waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: House Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Clean/Dirty magnet is my favorite, no more guessing
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what I needed for my new dishwasher that didn't have basket originally. Fits well is material is well done. Clean/Dirty magnet is my favorite, no more guessing, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for and it fit perfectly in my dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Latisha

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I love the magnet to put on the outside of washer
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Fits our dishwasher perfectly. Came quickly. We loved the magnet addition. I hope it lasts. Update: Two years later and it is still holding up, with zero issues. Definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Bosch silverwear tray
customer_reviews.text: This replacement tray worked great fit easy into the bottom of the dishwasher. We needed more silverware space and added this to our Bosch dishwasher and its great will highly suggest this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Shugart

customer_reviews.title: It fits
customer_reviews.text: perfect, exactly what I needed, It fit in my whirlpool perfectly, strong
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new one after my original from dishwasher fell apart and this fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chaotic Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This rack came fast but I didn't receive the clean/dirty sign.
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: Some design changes would make it way better
customer_reviews.text: The handle: isn’t tall enough to go past silverware in the basket, that’s awkward. And the deep groove in it collects water for later distribution around the kitchen when you go to put the silverware away (I drilled 3 holes in it alleviate this). The top would be better served if it latched to make silverware removal easier. The design on the top wastes about half the space with holes that are too small to fit anything; would have been better in ordered rows. I only bought this one because it fit in my really old dishwasher, wish I had had more choices.
customer_reviews.author: J Gillman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. I measured my old dishwasher utensil holder so I was looking for something that would fit in the space. Product was as described. The dirty/clean magnet were an extra bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit frigidaire dishwashers, but still better than paying $50 for genuine part.
customer_reviews.text: A new dishwasher is just $250 so financially it doesn't really make much sense to purchase a new dishwasher basket from frigidaire's website for $50 for a dishwasher that came with a house. However this doesn't fit frigidaire racks the clips are too small to actually push into the dishwasher rack and the holes in the bottom are too small to push into the rack stands (but it does fit chopsticks without them falling through... which I was worried about the frigidaire basket). You can separate them and they will fit but they fall over. All in all though, it's an okay product just wish they specified which brands it's actually compatible with.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Stafford

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it will work in our new Bosch dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used it yet, but we're really hating the gigantic silverware basket that came in our new Bosch, and this looks similar to the older version we used to have. For those who were wondering, it's pretty easy to pop off the handle if you're so inclined. If you're careful, you could probably put it back on, but we won't use it and it take up space, so it's off for now. I know the supplier is trying to be helpful by including a 'Clean/ Dirty' magnet with the order, but we'll never use it and most people we know have stainless appliances, which will not hold magnets.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement part
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I never thought of replacing my utensil basket when it went, but found exactly what I needed. The fact that it separated into two pieces is a major plus!
customer_reviews.author: M. Werder

customer_reviews.title: It fits but it has a design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I like this silverware basket mainly because it fits my Kenmore dishwasher really well. I purchased this one because it’s a good bit less expensive than the name brand ones. I do like that you can take it apart which is the way that I use it because it’s the way that my old one fit. The biggest flaw in this design is that it’s too shallow, about 1/3 less than my old one. Also, you should NOT pick it up by it’s handle unless you want to pick all of your silverware up off of the floor, which is what happened to me the first time I used it. Really?!! I suppose that “I got what I paid for”!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Dee

customer_reviews.title: Fit my Maytag Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: This product was a replacement for an original in my Maytag Dishwasher...it fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Zdanowicz

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher Silverware Basket
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher silverware basket is a great addition to my dishwasher. Before buying it I never had enough room for my silverware without overcrowding the original basket.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Homemaker

customer_reviews.title: A bad designed basket. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why this BAA key has so many good reviews. It is impossible to pick up due the fact that the handle don’t have a lock future. The basket will be unbalanced and everything will fall over when you want to pick it up! So handle it is not useful unless you very carefully balance all your silverware in it....Duh!! Second, The handle don’t go over even steak knives bc it is too short. Third, it retain water and when you pull it up water will speed everywhere. A waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking, not Universal.
customer_reviews.text: "Universal" is a stretch. Although it did fit into the space allotted in my dishwasher, it was unsteady and kept tipping to the side actually spilling silverware out. The handle is awkward and unusable to remove clean flatware as it's in the way of bringing the handle up. The clean/dirty magnet is a separate piece that you stick on the outside of your machine.. useless, honestly. I highly recommend looking up your particular dishwasher and ordering the replacement basket from the manufacturer if at all possible. That's what I wound up doing and this one went into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fit right in my son's Kitchenaid dishwasher. Already used it. The magnet is cute, as well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fits in my Whirlpool
customer_reviews.text: This silverware basket fits perfectly in my Whirlpool dishwasher, after separating the two halves. The plastic is not as heavy as that of the original basket, but seems heavy enough to last. I am giving only four stars because of the size of the slots/holes where you insert your silverware. There are several sizes and shapes of holes, but only the two largest sizes are large enough for my silverware handles, which flare out at the end. I am pleased with the basket overall and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It works well, when others did not.
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t fit exactly as I had hoped but it does split in half to make it adjustable. It comes with an adorable but mostly useless magnet. It’s actually a good idea when you have family members that take stuff out of the clean dishwasher but don’t actually empty the entire thing, but that would require them updated the magnet and others to look at it. Still, it’s cute. The box it came in was also really nice. It’s clear that this company is trying hard and wants people to be happy.
customer_reviews.author: TDK

customer_reviews.title: Cutlery holder
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this and love the handle and nice to have a magnet for clean or dirty! Thank you for a nice product
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A Himes

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE: very small dishwasher basket
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: It’s tiny. This basket looks to be much larger in the pictures but in fact is very small. Beware. Other than that it will be ok but may need 2 of them to fit the silverware that we had intended for it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas L

customer_reviews.title: Good but low sides
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and fits in my dishwasher well. The only thing I would change is that it isn't very deep. I would've liked it to have the sides a little taller so my ladles and larger spoons were held in there better, although I haven't had any fall out during wash. They do fall out if I barely bump into them when I'm loading other dishes, but otherwise, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Scriven de Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, but . . .
customer_reviews.text: I like this basket and also that it can come apart in two pieces to easily place in dishwasher. My quibble is that it is light duty plastic and with the hot water, plastic will break down faster and come apart. I may at a later date post if this happens sooner rather than later. Works as intended and hold items well. Purchased May 2020.
customer_reviews.author: AstrogirlTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not quite universal
customer_reviews.text: The basket is well made, sturdy and has a fold down handle that makes it easy to remove to carry flatware to the drawer. The only thing is that this is about 1/2 inch too long to properly fit in the GE dishwasher in my apartment. Though if it were up to me, I'd replace the dishwasher vs this basket.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Percard

customer_reviews.title: Universal
customer_reviews.text: It's not a perfect fit but it definitely suits it's purpose. Way better than the old one that had pieces broken in the bottom which meant having to be very careful loading utensils. With this new one I just pop the utensils in and don't have to worry about them falling thru. The cover is handy when you have lightweight things like measuring spoons that get blown out of the basket from the force of the water. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Velvetjade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition/replacement basket.
customer_reviews.text: This is better than what came in our dishwasher originally. We bought this because we always have too much dirty silverware. It works great and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: PTLadyCO

customer_reviews.title: Helpful little basket
customer_reviews.text: We got this to replace a broken utensil basket for our Maytag dishwasher. It doesn’t fit exactly in the same side space, so we have to set it in the back of the rack which is not as convenient. Also, it is not as large as the original, but works just fine. Like the optional cover which slides out of the way if not needed. Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: MJGee

customer_reviews.title: Name your brand and model number.
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with Bosch model SHV46C03UC/14. It would be helpful if other reviewers who encounter incompatibilities would include info on their brand and model number. If you’re looking for a Bosch basket go to their website where you can confirm compatibility with your model number. I found correct replacement at similar price. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: 44022 BookReader

customer_reviews.title: Well made and Love the included magnet that shows dirty or clean
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I needed by taking care of the dinnerware, on occasions, when my existing basket was out of room. Also fits really good in my Whirlpool Dishwasher, when the delivered baskets are separated
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: Love this basket and magnet!
customer_reviews.text: Dishwasher Silverware Basket Universal and Clean Dirty Magnet Sign are exactly what I needed. My silverware basket that came with the dishwasher is way too small. Now, I can conveniently add more silverware without crowding.
customer_reviews.author: Marie A.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Nice that it comes as 2 pieces so we can place them both towards the front.
customer_reviews.author: DSinNC

customer_reviews.title: Helps silverwear get cleaned better
customer_reviews.text: I really like the small size and the fact that you can separate the pieces. I am so glad it ordered this because my other one was in the door and so crammed I didn’t feel like the silverware was getting clean!
customer_reviews.author: gadgetgirl

product_meta.title: Dishwasher Silverware Basket Universal - Clean Dirty Magnet Sign - Utensil/Cutlery Holder Replacement - Fits Bosch, Maytag, Kenmore, Whirlpool, KitchenAid, LG, Samsung, Frigidaire, GE
product_meta.description:
Tired of your utensils falling through the holes of your dishwasher basket? Tired of guessing whether the dishes are clean or dirty?

LemonHouse has the perfect set for YOU! Plus it comes in a gift box. 

 Click ADD TO CART NOW to enjoy your Dishwasher Utensil Basket Replacement and Clean Dirty Magnet!

Will this fit my dishwasher?
Designed to universally fit most dishwasher models as long as the dimensions listed below suit your dishwasher. It can be divided into 2 separate baskets or combined into 1 basket whichever best fits your dishwasher model.

Basket Dimensions:
Height: 5.40 inches
Length without handle: 9.55 inches
Length with handle: 10.35 inches
Width top or opening part: 5.30 inches
Width base or bottom part: 5.00 inches

How to use the clean dirty dishwasher magnet?
Simply flip or turn the “CLEAN” side when starting the dishwasher. Then, flip over to the “DIRTY” side when dishwasher is loaded or empty. What a simple way to keep your kitchen efficient!

It is made of soft flexible magnet that will NOT scratch your appliance. It is 55 mil thick to ensure that you receive only PREMIUM quality clean dirty dishwasher magnet.

Clean Dirty Magnet Dimensions:
3.5 inches length x 2 inches height
1.44 mm or 55 mil in thickness

 To fully enjoy your LemonHouse Dishwasher Basket Set, we HIGHLY RECOMMEND to measure your dishwasher space and match it with the listed dimensions and to check that your dishwasher model is MAGNETIC. 

Make life in the kitchen easier and dish washing a breeze, ADD TO CART NOW!
feature_bullets: ✅ Divides into 2 BASKETS or combines into 1 making it easier to fit most dishwasher models. Please see listed dimensions below or in the photos to ensure it is suitable for your dishwasher. BEST TO MEASURE YOUR DISHWASHER SPACE BEFORE PURCHASING.
✅ AMPLE SPACE with 7 compartments for your cutleries and other kitchen utensils.

✅ Comes with double sided or reversible CLEAN DIRTY INDICATOR to stop you from guessing whether your dishes have been cleaned or not. Simply flip to “CLEAN” when you start your dishwasher. Then, flip back to “DIRTY” once dishwasher is empty or loaded. BEST TO MAKE SURE YOUR APPLIANCE IS MAGNETIC.

✅ HANDLE FOLDS DOWN which makes it easy to fit small dishwashers and for easy carrying from your dishwasher to the kitchen drawer. Half of the flatware caddy has a flip down LID to better separate and organize your silverware.
✅ Our 100% COMMITMENT is if you have any product issues, simply email us and we will make it right.
